S

score - Variable in class DoodleJump
 
scoreLabel - Variable in class DoodleJump
 
setBackground(Color) - Method in class Game
Sets the background color of the playing field The default color is black
setColor(Color) - Method in class GameObject
Sets the color of this object
setDelay(int) - Method in class Game
Sets the millisecond delay between calls to act methods.
setSize(int, int) - Method in class GameObject
Sets the pixel width and height of the object
setup() - Method in class DoodleJump
This method runs once to set up the game
setup() - Method in class Game
When implemented, this will allow the programmer to initialize the game before it begins running Adding objects to the game and setting their initial positions should be done here.
setX(int) - Method in class GameObject
Sets the x (horizontal) position of this object Setting the x position will not affect the y position
setY(int) - Method in class GameObject
Sets the y (vertical) position of this object Setting the y position will not affect the x position
setYSpeed(int) - Method in class Player
This method sets the y speed of the player
showChoosePlayerScreen() - Method in class DoodleJump
This method shows the choose player screen
showEndScreen() - Method in class DoodleJump
This method displays the end screen
showStartScreen() - Method in class DoodleJump
This method shows the start screen
SKeyPressed() - Method in class Game
Returns true if the 'S' key is being pressed down
sleepyD - Variable in class Game
true if the sleepy doodle is chosen
speed - Variable in class DoodleJump
 
speeds - Variable in class DoodleJump
 
sportsD - Variable in class Game
true if the sports doodle is chosen
start - Variable in class Game
true if the 'S' key is being held down
startGame() - Method in class Game
Starts updates to the game The game should automatically start.
startScreenLabel - Variable in class DoodleJump
 
stopGame() - Method in class Game
Stops updates to the game This can act like a "pause" method
